short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color picker tool with pallete and history

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color picker tool with pallete and history.

- Click on icon or use keyboard key shortcut to activate color picker.
- Color hex code automatically copies to the clipboard after picking color.
- different color formats hex, rgb, hsl etc.
